title: Immortal: Dark Slayer
description: Immortal: Dark Slayer is a top-down action RPG that puts you in the armor of a Fallen Knight, battling to purge the realm of demons, the undead, and creeping chaos. Drawing inspiration from the punishing combat of Dark Souls and Elden Ring, it delivers the same gritty challenge, reimagined with a top-down perspective and streamlined controls. Whether you're a seasoned RPG veteran or a newcomer to the genre, this dark fantasy adventure offers a thrilling, accessible experience.
